name: Drag a Horse (Bonus Goat Edition)
description:
You can drag a horse around and some goats too. there is a board, you could play a game on it or not, there are no rules no one can tell you what to do.

i'm gonna work on this game more and it will eventually be a much larger game with cool classes/alliances like:

  • Horse
  • Goth
  • Hot
  • Small
  • Bee

it's gonna be great, gotta just trust me on this. You can follow development at my twitter: https://twitter.com/PajamaBee_Vegan

oh, and if you found this through deer survivors, that game's almost complete! I'm just taking a bit of a break to do this project then i should release the full version later this month.
